title: Virus Response Gives Pence Prominent but Precarious Platform...

content:
WASHINGTONVice President Mike Pence has often found himself drafted to deal with some of the Trump administrations thorniest foreign and domestic problems. But helming its response to the novel coronavirus pandemic is his highest-stakes assignment yet.
